name: Froggy Tunnel
description:
A small frog platformer game on a time limit! 

Will you be able to escape from your small home and rise up to a new life, or will you forever be stuck down in the caves.

Controls

A - Move left

D - Move right

Space - Big jump

Left Click - Use Tongue

Tongue can grapple onto ground and eat small insects to regain health

(more functionality later)
